description:
I work on average about 2 hours per week producing affiliate review videos for YouTube that each generate me $200-$1500/month.

I can work from anywhere as along as I have my laptop, a microphone and internet access.

My videos generate me passive income 24/7/365, even when I'm sleeping.

...and now I'm going to show you exactly how I do it.

Take my course and watch over my shoulder as I re-create my entire system from scratch, even if you are a complete newbie.

Most of my students land their first sale within a week of completing the course.
title: Become A Professional YouTube Reviewer
